segments.text: Would you like to go skating with me this afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'd love to . But we're going to clean our dormitory . I can't be absent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe another time . People say that boys ' dormitories are in a mess , is it true ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In fact , our dormitory is much worse than they can be described .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's hard for me to imagine . How can you stand that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll get used to it gradually .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh my God , don't you know that such living environment is not healthy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we do . That's why we have a cleaning every three months .
segments.speaker: S2
